<properties pageTitle="52802490-ea04-4f65-877a-602e3260682e" description="c10d9e31-f83b-4c5b-a7b7-d7cfb47f2500" services="machine-learning" documentationCenter="" authors="jaymathe" manager="paulettm" editor="cgronlun"/>
<tags ms.service="machine-learning" ms.workload="data-services" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="09/02/2015" ms.author="jaymathe"/>

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
data <- maml.mapInputPort(1) # class: data.frame
data.split <- strsplit(data[1,1], ",")[[1]] data.split <- sapply(data.split, strsplit, ";", simplify = TRUE) data.split <- sapply(data.split, strsplit, ";", simplify = TRUE) data.split <- as.data.frame(t(data.split)) data.split <- data.matrix(data.split) data.split <- data.frame(data.split) model <- lm(data.split)
out=data.frame(predict(model,data.split)) out <- data.frame(t(out))
maml.mapOutputPort("out");
